reviews:
I didn't know what to expect when getting this. I just wanted a basic hoodies to wear that has a loose relaxed fit.
This hoodie seems to be a bit snugger than expected and is kind of stiff (probably just because it's new).
I wouldn't shy away from buying a second hoodie but I'll also look into other ones of this basic style.
The neck is pretty small, i got about 3/4 of a inch of space from my neck which makes it hard to quickly pull on, and is a nightmare if you're wearing glasses. Thinking about cutting it a little for more room, but I've never did that with a shirt before and I don't want to just have it continuously tear down the sweater little by little.
product_name: Hanes Mens Pullover EcoSmart Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt Hoody

reviews: Good quality. Great value. I purposely ordered an XXL even though I'm a medium fit. However I think I should have ordered an XL instead as it was slightly too large. An XL would have been perfect for me. I like my sweatshirts to be a little loose fitting, not so snug.5
product_name: Hanes Mens Pullover EcoSmart Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt Hoody

reviews: I know this is a mens sweater but I just needed a hoodie to throw on while camping and I didnt have alot of time so the 1 day shipping was perfect. I am a size 12 38D and xl fits so good!! Its not crazy thick but just the perfect thickness and the inside is so soft! I'm not sure how the inside will wash because it is kind of fuzzy but I plan to hang dry so it should be fine. Its just the right amount of baggy without being too big and I can't wait to cuddle up in it!
product_name: Hanes Mens Pullover EcoSmart Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt Hoody

review_title: EXACTLY as described and what I wantedüòÉ
reviews: I am so happy I took the chance on this! I never have luck ordering clothes and this time I got it right! The size is perfect. I ordered a medium and there is ample room if I want to wear a t or long sleeved shirt underneath. It is very comfy and the colour is nice (charcoal gray). The price was also perfect.
product_name: Hanes Mens Pullover EcoSmart Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt Hoody

reviews: It fit great! I‚Äôm 6‚Äô1 and 190 lbs (I look lighter then 190 more like 170 - 180) it fit good from the sides and from the height which is hard to find because sometimes they are too baggy and make me look like 220lbs, but this one fit great. I‚Äôm about to buy another one in white.
product_name: Hanes Mens Pullover EcoSmart Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt Hoody

review_title: Thin sweater, great for overcast weather
reviews:
I really like these sweaters! They‚Äôre a bit thin, so they‚Äôre perfect for overcast weather.
The only issue I have is that they make the pocket really small (even in the larger sizes, I have a large and XL) so my phone has fallen out while bending over on a few occasions.
product_name: Hanes Mens Pullover EcoSmart Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt Hoody

review_title: Fits quite small BUT excellent soft hoodie
reviews: Fits quite smaller compare to other similar hoodies in the same size BUT overall excellent hoodie, not too thick or too thin, its nice for spring kind of weather, the interior is really soft and comfy. Would absolutely recommend it and would buy more of it.
product_name: Hanes Mens Pullover EcoSmart Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt Hoody

reviews: Bought this along with two other higher priced sweaters and was surprised at how soft and comfortable this was to wear. I'm finding I'm wearing it a lot more than the other ones which cost 3 or 4 times more than this one. Will be ordering more for sure, especially at this price point! Excellent value for a hoodie sweater!
product_name: Hanes Mens Pullover EcoSmart Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt Hoody

reviews: I ordered a size up for winter and it's wonderful! Great fit and product. Made well and PURPLE!!! My roommate also got the grey and it's quite nice as well.

reviews: The colour is perfect, just as I expected and imagined as "charcoal heather". I know this is men‚Äôs size but it‚Äôs pretty long. Material is soft and comfortable, not itchy at all. The price (I think I bought it at $20) is really good for what you get.

reviews: I am genuinely surprised by the terrible quality of this product. I guess ever since MJ stopped doing commercials, Hanes products have gone seriously down hill.
